queries.text: As expressly mentioned in the document, what are the: (a)amount of existing deposits as on 1 April; (b) amount of depositsrenewed during the year; (c) amount of new deposits accepted during theyear (including the breakup between secured and unsecured depositsaccepted during the year); (d) amount of deposits repaid during theyear; and (e) balance of deposits outstanding at the end of the year?
